item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @Gazmask Gazmask
item.description:
@Gazmask wrote:

Hello
i’ve been adding those codes on some commands so you can’t have food or teleport in the wildy …
Everything was fine untill i compiled
I had 3 errors , fixed 2
But this one doesn’t seem to go away …

client.java:13212: illegal start of expression
      public void fromBank(int itemID,int fromSlot,int amount) {
      ^
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

I’ve been adding brackets untill it gave me 100 errors … then i tried deleting some but all this doesn’t seem to work oO
Please don’t tell me “Add some more brackets…” Because that doesn’t work lol most brackets i could enter were like 7-8
Then it gave me 100 errors ;D

Anyone knows how to do this ?
This is the code that i added to the commands
For the teleport commands :

{ if(!nonWild()) { sendMessage("You cannot teleport out the wilderness."); } else {
for the food command

{ if(!nonWild()) { sendMessage("You cannot spawn food in the wilderniss."); } else {

Thanks in advance
